original: 正史無此人，乃《三國演義》虛構角色。為曹操所屬滎陽太守。關羽千里走單騎，王植意圖謀害關羽，反被關羽所殺。
text: There is no such person in the official history, but a fictional character in The Romance of the Three Kingdoms. For Cao Cao's Xingyang prefect. Guan Yu rode solo for thousands of miles, Wang Zhi intended to murder Guan Yu, but was killed by Guan Yu.
